Body.Content:
Updated May 15, 2025: We have updated the timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

We are excited to announce a new feature in the Copilot menu in Word: Fix grammar and spellings. This feature provides a one-click solution to apply all grammar and spelling corrections simultaneously, with the option to review and undo any changes you prefer not to keep.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 483954

When this will happen:

General Availability (Worldwide): We will begin rolling out by mid-May 2025 (previously late April) and expect to complete by mid-June 2025.

How this will affect your organization:

Customers will have access to a new feature in their Copilot menu: Fix grammar and spellings. This feature provides a one-click solution to apply all grammar and spelling corrections simultaneously, with the option to review and undo any changes they prefer not to keep.

Users can select text in a Word document to review all the spelling and grammar errors and Copilot will help them fix those errors inline and allow users the ability to review each of the changes made.

This feature is available to users with a Copilot license

What you need to do to prepare:

You may consider updating your training and documentation as appropriate. These features are available to users with a Copilot license.

Review the following resource to understand how to manage Microsoft 365 Copilot access within your organization:

  • Manage Microsoft 365 Copilot scenarios in the Microsoft 365 admin center

Title: Microsoft Word: Fix spelling and grammar all at once with Copilot
